document.full_text: the killing of osama bin laden when he was unarmed has raised concerns the united states may have gone too far in acting as policeman, judge and executioner of the world's most wanted man.
document.title: concerns raised over shooting of unarmed bin laden
lines_and_colors: the killing of osama bin laden when he was unarmed has raised concerns the united states may have gone too far in acting as policeman, judge and executioner of the world's most wanted man.
